qas.question: Artist of the Decade was bestowed upon Beyonce from which magazine?
Whats the first year that Beyonce appear on the Time 100 list?
Beyonce than appeared again on the Time 100 list in what year?
What did the Guardian name her?
When did Beyonce first make the Time 100 List?
When was she again on the Time 100 List and on the cover?
Who said that she is the reigning national voice?
Who stated that Beyoncé is the most important musician of the 21st century?
Which publication named Beyoncé the Artist of the Decade?
What list did Beyoncé make in 2013?
Who said Beyoncé is the heir-apparent diva of the United States?
What year was Beyoncé featured both on the Time 100 list as well as the cover of the issue?

context: In The New Yorker music critic <a7_0>Jody Rosen<a7_0/> described Beyoncé as "the most important and compelling popular musician of the twenty-first century..... the result, the logical end point, of a century-plus of pop." When <a0_0><a8_0>The Guardian<a8_0/><a0_0/> named her <a3_0>Artist of the Decade<a3_0/>, Llewyn-Smith wrote, "Why Beyoncé? [...] Because she made not one but two of the decade's greatest singles, with Crazy in Love and Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It), not to mention her hits with Destiny's Child; and this was the decade when singles – particularly R&B singles – regained their status as pop's favourite medium. [...] [She] and not any superannuated rock star was arguably the greatest live performer of the past 10 years." In <a1_0><a4_0>2013<a4_0/><a1_0/>, Beyoncé made the <a9_0>Time 100 list<a9_0/>, <a6_0><a10_0>Baz Luhrmann<a10_0/><a6_0/> writing "no one has that voice, no one moves the way she moves, no one can hold an audience the way she does... When Beyoncé does an album, when Beyoncé sings a song, when Beyoncé does anything, it's an event, and it's broadly influential. Right now, she is the heir-apparent diva of the USA — the reigning national voice." In <a2_0><a5_0><a11_0>2014<a11_0/><a5_0/><a2_0/>, Beyoncé was listed again on the Time 100 and also featured on the cover of the issue.
